summary.line1: Oliver graduated from Curtin with a Bachelor of Physiotherapy.
summary.line2: He understands the importance of professional development to further enhance his clinical skills after graduation.
summary.line3: He completed a qualification of deep dry needling and several courses including shoulder rehabilitation, running biomechanics, headache, and dizziness management.
summary.line4: Oliver is interested in treating musculoskeletal conditions especially shoulder, back, and neck pain.
summary.line5: He believes a combination of "hands-on" treatment and therapeutic exercises is important for clients to manage their musculoskeletal conditions and achieve their goals.
summary.line6: Outside the clinic, Oliver goes to the gym regularly. He enjoys grocery shopping and cooking big meals.
